snippet.title: Core Trials PC - Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Core Trials is a motion-controlled, Undertale-inspired bullet hell where your movement is your defense. Face the Trial Masters, dodge their relentless attacks, and unlock your core’s true potential—if you can survive.

Dash, jump, duck, and dive in this high-octane action experience, all controlled with just your webcam—no VR required!

Wishlish Now https://store.steampowered.com/app/2549160/Core_Trials/
Early Access will be available at STEAM on 3rd February!

Join our Discord Server for more updates and to be a part of the development process: https://discord.gg/kgprfhtUay

Copyright @ Ohilo 2025

#undertale #motiongaming #earlyaccess #gameplay #trailer #speed #dodge #jump #dive #indiangame #coretrials #coretraining #ct #core
